6Jul2023

Matinee: A Silent Voice

The last matinee went pretty well, so we're doing it again. This time we're showing A Silent Voice.

Join us at the White Hart on the 22nd July. The film starts at 1pm sharp, so be there about 12:30.

5Jun2023

Matinee: Summer Wars

Hello everyone, we're watching a movie (Summer Wars) and chilling in the beer garden at the White Hart Pub on the 17th June 12:30am come and join us.

11Apr2023

This Friday at 7:30pm we will be seeing SUZUME at the Vue cinema. Come and join us!

Change of Plans

Change of Plans tonight, due to technical issues at our regular venue we will instead host at the Red Lion Hotel, Wellington Hall, Basingstoke today 7PM

Food

Due to the heat, the White Hart's kitchen will be closed today. We're still there though, and doing everything we can to make it habitable.

22Nov2020

Movies

Instead of taking a break over Christmas and new year like we normally would, we've got a whole load of movies happening over the next few weeks. Check out the schedule above for details.

12Apr2020

Schedule resumes on 28 April

The online meetings have been going well, so we're going to resume the shows we were watching from Tuesday 28 April. Until then we'll continue with the irregulars we've been showing. Join us on Discord every Tuesday evening.

Join the Discord

20Mar2020

Twitter down

Our Twitter feed is currently locked due to a silly mistake. Please hold on while we get it fixed.

18Mar2020

Basingstoke Anime Society is moving online

Sadly, due to the coronavirus, our meetings in the White Hart are suspended from next Tuesday and so our regular anime schedule is on hiatus.

Instead we'll be meeting online every Tuesday evening from 7:00 to watch anime together and chat. Click the button above to join our Discord server.

Join the Discord

12Sept2006

Welcome to Basingstoke Anime Society!

We meet every Tuesday to watch anime.

Check out one of our favourites.
